comment: The US Mint includes both the motto "In God We Trust" and the American flag on the moon landing th anniversary coin. Did this escape the inquisition, or Is it because only non cultmarx Whites are interested in American coins and commemoratives?
amr:
# ::snt The US Mint includes both the motto "In God We Trust" and the American flag on the moon landing th anniversary coin. Did this escape the inquisition, or Is it because only non cultmarx Whites are interested in American coins and commemoratives?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / include-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "US"
                        :op2 "Mint"))
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (m2 / motto
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "In"
                              :op2 "God"
                              :op3 "We"
                              :op4 "Trust"))
                  :op2 (f / flag
                        :mod (c / country
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "America"))))
            :ARG2 (c2 / coin
                  :mod c
                  :time (a2 / anniversary
                        :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                              :value 2))))
      :snt2 (a3 / amr-choice
            :op1 (e / escape-01
                  :ARG0 (t / this)
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / inquire-01))
            :op2 (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / interest-01
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :ARG1-of (w / white-02)
                              :mod (c4 / cultmarx
                                    :polarity -)
                              :mod (o2 / only))
                        :ARG2 (a4 / and
                              :op1 (c5 / coin
                                    :mod c)
                              :op2 (c6 / commemorative
                                    :mod c))))))
